As for Derek Hough 's attempt to set up home Stateside with the Promise This hitmaker, the friend explained to Heat: Cheryl Cole and Derek Hough have definitely been getting closer, but she wants her own life in LA- her own identity, not just as Derek Hough 's girlfriend. They added: "She needs space and a chance to make her own life... Simon Cowell wants Cheryl Cole to be happy and he knows she'll enjoy living in his neighbourhood."
